message: Our president has had multiple times to step up to this growing threat and has not . The longer he waits , the more we are in danger

Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".

I am convinced that the Clintons look out across this land of ours and insofar as they are concerned they see nothing other than what they think are rubes, rednecks and buffoons that they can lie to, cheat and con. I suspect they privately laugh to themselves about how easily people are fooled and I suspect that even the Clintons are surprised about what they have gotten by with.

The taps were not ilegal. They were all approved by the justice, the process was running in secret to avoid interference, but once Lula was nominated minister, government manoeuvre to avoid his prosecution, The judge, through legal means, declared the process as public And legally exposed all evidence. If you were a lawyer, a good one, if you had studied law in Brazil you would know that! I remind you Latin countries legal system follow the Romam law, different from what happens in UK and US. And you are also wrong about Brazilians, all we want is all corrupted people to pay for their crimes.
